author: murilogouvea

comments.content:
Looks like Corpid Office Bold to me. Or it could simply be Corpid Bold. I’m not sure I readily see the difference between the two. Definitely some sort of bold form of Corpid.  
 [http://www.lucasfonts.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20080511225225/http:/www.lucasfonts.com/ "http://www.lucasfonts.com")

Looks like you got it, although that web site is very stingy about letting you see complete samples of the fonts.

What did you use as ’earmarks’ to help you ID this one from these 6 letters, Bobby?

- Mike Yanega
I figured the lettering had to be designed by Luc(as) De Groot. The “S” brought up “The Sans,” but the cuts on the “t” and “i” narrowed it down to Corpid.
